attributes.action: Make Arsene Wenger the new manager of Manchester United football club.
attributes.additional_details: Sign this even if you don't watch football. Trust me, this will help put the Great back into Great Britain.
attributes.background:
Jose has finally gone. Well done to the United board but I would also like to thank the cabinet office and Ms May.

There is no finer specimen in the footballing world than Arsene Wenger. Despite having limited Premier League experience, just imagine arsenalfantv for the rest of eternity.
